# Magneticky indukcny tok
$\Phi = B \times S \times \cos \alpha$ \
$[\Phi] = T \times m^2 = Wb$ \

- B: Magneticka indukcia 
- S: plocha vodica 
- $\alpha$ : uhol normaloveho vektra
- **Pre cievku:**  
    - N: pocet zavitov cievky 

$\Phi = N \times B \times S \times \cos \alpha$ \ 

# Faradayov zakon
$U_i = -\frac{\Delta \Phi}{\Delta t}$ \
$[U] = -\frac{\Delta Wb}{\Delta s}$

- **$\Phi$ sa moze casom menit:** 
    - ak sa meni velkost B
    - ak sa meni velkost S
    - ak sa meni velkost $\alpha$
    - kombinacia predchadzajucich

# Vlastna indukcia
$B = \mu \times \frac{N}{l} \times I)$ \
\begin{flalign*}
    \Phi &= N \times B \times S && \\
    & = N \times S \times \mu \times \frac{N}{l} \times I && \\
    & = (\mu \frac{N^2S}{l}) I && \\
    & = LI && \\
\end{flalign*}
$L = \mu \frac{N^2S}{l}$ \

- $[L] = H$ **henry**
- **Indukovane napatie:** 

$U_i = -L \frac{\Delta I}{\Delta t}$ \

# Praca na cievke
$\Delta W = |U_i| I \Delta t$ \

# Energia cievky
$E_m = \frac{1}{2}LI^2$ \
